content: C'erano sei punti "dame": non appartenevano a nessuno dei due giocatori, poiché né il Bianco né il Nero erano riusciti a conquistarli.
translations: eng:There were six dame points﹕ they didn't belong to either of the two players, as neither White nor Black had managed to c
